alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 29 at 3:15AM MDT until July 29 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: .Excessive rainfall from monsoonal moisture is expected to form over the far eastern plains this afternoon through evening. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MDT THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is no longer expected to pose a threat. Please continue to heed remaining road closures. * WHERE...Bent, Prowers, eastern Las Animas, and Bent Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM MDT this morning through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms are expected to develop across the region, but in particular, persistent moderate to heavy rainfall is expected over the southeast corner of Colorado. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood Flooding is no longer expected to pose a threat. Please continue to heed remaining road closures.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
